regen.absent_element: consultation of train data should be allowed anytime as described
regen.new_specification: The driver shall be able to consult train data at any time, regardless of train movement conditions.

regen.absent_element: consultation of train data anytime by the driver
regen.new_specification: The driver shall be able to consult train data at any time, irrespective of whether the train is stationary.

regen.absent_element: consulting train data while the train is not stationary
regen.new_specification: The driver shall be able to consult train data even when the train is in motion.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
